H0.text: who was allowed to vote in the roman republic. All Roman citizens

H1.text: who was allowed to vote in the roman republic. Only landowners

H2.text: who was allowed to vote in the roman republic. Male citizens over 18

H3.text: who was allowed to vote in the roman republic. unknown

A4.text: Male citizens had the rights to vote (ius suffragi)

A5.text: The optimo iure held the ius suffragii and ius honorum, the additional rights to vote and to hold office
